column4: I am using a fresh install of ubuntu 9.04, using tightvnc (vncserver) but gnome has a different appearance when i login to VNC, it looks "old"/grey/has a 1 px shadow/stroke around all edges etc
I don't think gnome starts by default in vnc...I think you are looking at twm
is the vnc gnome using the same theme your desktop is using?
